title: Technology industries on both sides of the Atlantic call for an EU-U.S. agreement on conformity assessment
author: unknown
text: Orgalim joins Europe Unlocked Orgalim, Europe’s Technology Industries, has joined Europe Unlocked, a coalition of organisations representing European businesses. This alliance aims to increase Europe’s competitiveness by strengthening the Single Market. The coalition advocates for a fresh approach to economic and security challenges, prioritising open and competitive markets. By prioritising these principles, productivity can be boosted - a key driver for continuous economic growth in the EU. This economic prosperity, in turn, reinforces security for Europe, supported by a thriving Single Market that creates jobs, fosters growth, and ensures prosperity. In its role as a coalition partner, Orgalim will actively participate in campaign events and contribute to shaping future initiatives.
